title: usePrevious( )
description: The `usePrevious` hook allows developers to easily track and access the previous value of a state or prop within functional components in React. In this article, you'll find practical code implementations and real-world use cases, demonstrating how the custom hook can be applied in various scenarios. We'll break down the process of creating the hook, explain its key features, and provide a detailed explanation to help you understand its functionality and use.
